name: auto
description: Causes the eyes to run random background movements

name: audio
description: Plays the sound that corresponds to the inputted trigger

name: rotate
description: Rotates the specified eye by the specified amount in degrees (anti-clockwise = positive)

name: shift
description: Shifts eye relative to current position (left, down = positive and 0, 0 = no shift)

name: blink
description: Triggers a blink action

name: wink
description: Triggers a wink action in the specified eye

name: squint
description: Fully open = 0, fully closed = 1

name: track
description: Causes the eyes to look off to the specified direction, max x = 35, max y = 25

name: gaze
description: Slower track, max x = 35, max y = 25

name: dilate
description: Causes the pupils to dilate by a specified amount, min = 0, max = 1

name: roll eyes
description: Triggers an eye-roll action

name: jitter
description: Causes eyes to rapidly jitter back and forth a specified number of times

name: scary eyes
description: Causes eyes to roll into the socket and back again

name: shifty eyes
description: Causes eyes to squint and look left and right suspiciously

name: read
description: Alternates slowly looking left and squickly looking right, as if reading

name: reset
description: Clears the command queue and sets eyes to start position

name: sleep
description: Clears the command queue and closes eyes

name: wake
description: Opens eyes

name: wait
description: Generates a pause before the next command is sent

name: close
description: Terminates the program
